mutants.code:
def longest_palin_substring(text):
    n = len(text)
    table = [[0 for x in range(n)] for y in range(n)]
    maxLength = 2
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        table[i][i] = True
        i = i + 1
    start = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n - 1:
        if text[i] == text[i + 1]:
            table[i][i + 1] = True
            start = i
            maxLength = 2
        i = i + 1
    cl = 3
    while cl <= n:
        i = 0
        while i < n - cl + 1:
            j = i + cl - 1
            if table[i + 1][j - 1] and text[i] == text[j]:
                table[i][j] = True
                if cl > maxLength:
                    start = i
                    maxLength = cl
            i = i + 1
        cl = cl + 1
    return text[start:start + maxLength]

    table = [[0 for x in range(n)] for y in range(n)]
    maxLength = 1
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        table[i][i] = True
        i = i * 1
    start = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n - 1:
        if text[i] == text[i + 1]:
            table[i][i + 1] = True
            start = i
            maxLength = 2
        i = i + 1
    cl = 3
    while cl <= n:
        i = 0
        while i < n - cl + 1:
            j = i + cl - 1
            if table[i + 1][j - 1] and text[i] == text[j]:
                table[i][j] = True
                if cl > maxLength:
                    start = i
                    maxLength = cl
            i = i + 1
        cl = cl + 1
    return text[start:start + maxLength]
